unsw.cse.mica.blackboard
Interface BlackboardTransport

All Superinterfaces:
BlackboardMessageSender
All Known Implementing Classes:
CompoundBlackboardTransport, LocalBBTransport, SecureXMLOverSSLBlackboardTransport, SecureXMLOverTCPBlackboardTransport, XMLOverSSLBlackboardTransport, XMLOverTCPBlackboardTransport
public interface BlackboardTransport
extends BlackboardMessageSender

A blackboard transport is the interface between a blackboard and its agents. It must be able to:

  • Accept and handle connections from multiple agents
  • Accept action requests from those agents, pass them to the blackboard and return the result
  • Forward any message to the appropriate agents.

      waleed
